ComicInfo.Summary:
Adventure The Fourth: The Endless Nightmare of Leonard Samson: From Earth-617, Dr. Samson is helping Bruce Banner to overcome his monstrous alter-ego when they accidentally invade Nightmare's realm. Nightmare then conquers Earth-617 and forces Samson to aid him in conquering Earth-616. Possessed by a demon, Leonard Samson eliminates Doc's teammates by magical means before setting his sights on Doc himself.
A Cold Winter Coming: The Living Totem faces his greatest foe again; only this time, Cold Winter's spirit is trapped in a doll-sized toy.
